headline: How the Anson Gas Explosion Lawsuit at Atmos Energy (ATO) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In April 2025, a house explosion in Anson, Texas, allegedly caused by a leaking gas pipe left behind by Atmos Energy, resulted in catastrophic injuries to a technician and led to a lawsuit filed by the Potts Law Firm on behalf of the victim and his spouse. This legal action brings new attention to Atmos Energy's operational practices and potential liabilities, raising questions about risk management in its service termination procedures. We'll assess how heightened legal and operational...

headline: Buy These 4 Low-Beta Utility Stocks to Navigate Market Volatility
summary: ATO, OGE, FTS and NWN stand out as low-beta utility stocks offering steady earnings growth and solid dividend yield.
